video.title: Scrotal Recall
video.synopsis: In his quest for true love, Dylan found chlamydia. Joined by friends Evie and Luke, he relives past encounters as he notifies all his former partners.

episodes.synopsis: Dylan relives a nightmarish encounter from three years ago when he visits Abigail, the first on his alphabetical list of past conquests.
episodes.title: Abigail

episodes.synopsis: While visitng Anna, Dylan recalls a disastrous double date with Luke, who was trying to keep Anna's classmate, Cleo, from discovering his shallowness.
episodes.title: Anna

episodes.synopsis: While Luke puts the moves on a childhood crush at a swanky party, Dylan and Evie cure their boredom by running through items on Luke's bucket list.
episodes.title: Cressida

episodes.synopsis: The show flashes back three years to a birthday dinner between Evie and Dylan that comes undone. Meanwhile, Dylan reconnects with Abigail.
episodes.title: Jane

episodes.synopsis: Dylan's visit to Bethany recalls a dinner with her intimidating big brother, while Luke tries to learn why his female co-workers all hate him.
episodes.title: Bethany

episodes.synopsis: Dylan discovers why ex-girlfriend Phoebe hasn't been returning his messages. Later, Luke urges Dylan to confess his love to Evie.
episodes.title: Phoebe
